Susanna Reid has raised eyebrows on ITV's Good Morning Britain after making a confession live on the air to co-presenter Piers Morgan.

articles.author: Sky
articles.title: Sia reveals she has become a grandmother at 44 after adopting sons last year - Sky News
articles.description: The star, who often covers her face to remain anonymous, adopted two 18-year-olds who were "aging out of the care system" in 2019.

articles.author: Katie Palmer
articles.title: The Baby-Sitters Club cast: Who is in the cast of The Baby-Sitters Club? - Express.co.uk
articles.description: THE BABY-SITTERS CLUB is a new series coming to Netflix and inspired by the 90s film of the same name. Who is in the cast of The Baby-Sitters Club?
articles.content:
Watson Brewer - Mark Feuerstein
Watson Brewer is Kristy's stepdad and he has his own children - Karen and Andrew.
In the books, he is known for living in a big mansion on McLelland Road. His first … [+689 chars]

articles.title: Richard Madeley apologises for 'misjudged' advice column about domestic violence - Sky News
articles.description: The TV presenter has been criticised by charities over his response to a Telegraph reader asking for advice about a neighbour.
